title: Simple Arm Gripper not working in ODE or Bullet

content.raw:
The simple arm and simple gripper models seem to be working, but the Simple Arm Gripper model is not working in either ODE or Bullet. Inserting the model causes some links to not appear or to fly around everywhere. It may be a plugin issue.

Also, I observered a gzserver crash one time while running under ODE, with the failure coming at [ODEPhysics.cc:867](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/dd62e75c1b2ade42173480bd3810286480883269/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.cc?at=joint_refactor_rewind#cl-867):

content.html:
The simple arm and simple gripper models seem to be working, but the Simple Arm Gripper model is not working in either ODE or Bullet. Inserting the model causes some links to not appear or to fly around everywhere. It may be a plugin issue.

Also, I observered a gzserver crash one time while running under ODE, with the failure coming at ODEPhysics.cc:867:
